definitions: a person who is able to convey or exchange information, news, or ideas, especially one who is eloquent or skilled

examples.text: his successor was a less effective communicator

shortDefinitions: person who is able to convey or exchange information, news, or ideas

definitions: an apparatus used to exchange information between individuals, ships, planes, etc.

examples.text: it'll send a signal to your hand-held communicator

shortDefinitions: apparatus used to exchange information between individuals, ships, planes
